value.title: Power BI From and To Date Filtering with One Slicer
value.excerpt: It happens that you might have two fields as From and To date (or Start and End date) in your dataset, and you want a date slicer in the report. The date slicer has to filter records in a way that the FROM and the TO dates are in the range of dates selected in the slicer. There are multiple ways of doing

value.title: Relationship in Power BI with Multiple Columns
value.excerpt: You can create relationships in Power BI between tables. Relationships are useful for some functions to work across multiple tables and produce the result. value.excerpt: The filter arguments in CALCULATE can reference multiple columns from the same table in a single predicate: This is possible since March 2021 in Power BI, before that it was possible to filter a single column reference.  Article and download: https://sql.bi/705207?aff=yt  How to learn DAX: https://www.sqlbi.com/guides/dax/?aff=yt

value.excerpt: Combining two queries in Power Query or in Power BI is one of the most basic and also essential tasks that you would need to do in most of data preparation scenarios.
